attributes.action: MAKE BULLYING A CRIME AND PUT ON THEIR RECORD
attributes.additional_details:
If we make people feel something can be done and bullies can be punished this may encourage people to speak out and even save lives, 
I want to stop people feeling like their only option is to end their life, 
This needs to stop now! bulling can lead to a death of a person and this is not right, 
Please help support this petition and lets help save lives and win back the right to live as the people we grow to be.
attributes.background:
I strongly believe no one should be bullied even if you are a young child, a teenager or even an adult. 
A person should be punished for bulling of any harm or mental harm comes to a person via bulling.
